Entries.DialogueText: 啊，镇长刘易斯跟我说你刚到这里。我是玛妮！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 啊，镇长刘易斯跟我说你刚到这里。我是玛妮！

Entries.DialogueText: 我在我的牧场上卖家禽和动物护理用品。你有空的话可以来光顾一下哦。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我在我的牧场上卖家禽和动物护理用品。你有空的话可以来光顾一下哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 哇，{Farmer_Name}，太感谢你了。我会一直记在心里的！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哇，，太感谢你了。我会一直记在心里的！

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}，谢谢你，我一直想要一本年历，里面写的都很准！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ，谢谢你，我一直想要一本年历，里面写的都很准！

Entries.DialogueText: 我相信农场上有了小动物陪伴你会很开心的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我相信农场上有了小动物陪伴你会很开心的。

Entries.DialogueText: pet一开始肯定会有点怕生，动物适应新环境总是需要一段时间的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: pet一开始肯定会有点怕生，动物适应新环境总是需要一段时间的。

Entries.DialogueText: pet它适应了吗？那个地方宠物肯定很喜欢探索。
Entries.DisplayPattern: pet它适应了吗？那个地方宠物肯定很喜欢探索。

Entries.DialogueText: 我突然想起来……你收养%pet已经有一年了吧，我猜它应该已经很亲近你了！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我突然想起来……你收养%pet已经有一年了吧，我猜它应该已经很亲近你了！

Entries.DialogueText: 哦？你买了一匹马？那真是太好了！马儿是很了不起的动物。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦？你买了一匹马？那真是太好了！马儿是很了不起的动物。

Entries.DialogueText: 谢恩最近明显变得积极乐观了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢恩最近明显变得积极乐观了。

Entries.DialogueText: 幸好你搬到了这里，还跟他相处得那么好！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 幸好你搬到了这里，还跟他相处得那么好！

Entries.DialogueText: 谢恩搬到你的农场上去，我很高兴……或许他可以把家族传统传承下去！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢恩搬到你的农场上去，我很高兴……或许他可以把家族传统传承下去！

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿嘿……终于有机会展示一下我在有氧健身俱乐部辛苦付出的成果了。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿嘿……终于有机会展示一下我在有氧健身俱乐部辛苦付出的成果了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我感觉很暖和。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我感觉很暖和。

Entries.DialogueText: 嘻嘻……看到大家都穿着泳衣还挺好玩的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘻嘻……看到大家都穿着泳衣还挺好玩的。

Entries.DialogueText: 哎哟……椅子是湿的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎哟……椅子是湿的。

Entries.DialogueText: 呼……真热！ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呼……真热！

Entries.DialogueText: 呃啊！ {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呃啊！

Entries.DialogueText: ……嗯……什么？啊……我不知道那是什么…… {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ……嗯……什么？啊……我不知道那是什么……

Entries.DialogueText: 我爱动物，{Farmer_Name}先生。如果你好好对待你的动物的话，我相信我们能成为好朋友的！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我爱动物，先生。如果你好好对待你的动物的话，我相信我们能成为好朋友的！

Entries.DialogueText: 我真的爱动物，{Farmer_Name}女士。好好地对待你的动物，我们就能成为好朋友，一定能的！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我真的爱动物，女士。好好地对待你的动物，我们就能成为好朋友，一定能的！

Entries.DialogueText: 动物是如此的天真无邪，真好。如果我们不照顾它们，谁来照顾它们呢？ {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 动物是如此的天真无邪，真好。如果我们不照顾它们，谁来照顾它们呢？

Entries.DialogueText: 但愿当我拿走鸡蛋的时候，母鸡们不会太难过。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但愿当我拿走鸡蛋的时候，母鸡们不会太难过。

Entries.DialogueText: 你已经在这儿呆了一段时间了，……现在你的农场怎么样了？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你已经在这儿呆了一段时间了，……现在你的农场怎么样了？

Entries.DialogueText: 只要你不疏忽的话，照料动物其实是一件很简单的事！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 只要你不疏忽的话，照料动物其实是一件很简单的事！

Entries.DialogueText: 在这里，我终于能放松一下，聊聊天了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 在这里，我终于能放松一下，聊聊天了。

Entries.DialogueText: 今天人不太多呢…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 今天人不太多呢……

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} marnieAnimalSal
Entries.DisplayPattern: # marnieAnimalSal

Entries.DialogueText: 我把一大篮牛奶都打翻了，太糟了。比琳达辛苦劳作的成果啊，真是浪费。$k {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我把一大篮牛奶都打翻了，太糟了。比琳达辛苦劳作的成果啊，真是浪费。

Entries.DialogueText: 你来了就好！现在更热闹了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你来了就好！现在更热闹了。

Entries.DialogueText: 呼！努力工作了一天之后休息一下感觉真是不错。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 呼！努力工作了一天之后休息一下感觉真是不错。

Entries.DialogueText: 玛妮好像没看到你……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 玛妮好像没看到你……

Entries.DialogueText: *唉*……我今天不是很有效率。
Entries.DisplayPattern: *唉*……我今天不是很有效率。

Entries.DialogueText: 我总能在这儿看到克林特，但是他不愿意和任何人说话。他总是时不时地回头瞅瞅。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我总能在这儿看到克林特，但是他不愿意和任何人说话。他总是时不时地回头瞅瞅。

Entries.DialogueText: 谢恩不住这里了，所以我只好开始教贾斯照看小鸡了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 谢恩不住这里了，所以我只好开始教贾斯照看小鸡了。

Entries.DialogueText: 我的侄子谢恩已经在我这待了几个月了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我的侄子谢恩已经在我这待了几个月了。

Entries.DialogueText: 不过他会帮我养鸡，所以也没什么可抱怨的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不过他会帮我养鸡，所以也没什么可抱怨的。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好像不是很担心这场雨？那我就稍微安心一点了……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好像不是很担心这场雨？那我就稍微安心一点了……

Entries.DialogueText: 但愿牛都躲好了，没有乱跑…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但愿牛都躲好了，没有乱跑……

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，感觉根本没必要害怕嘛……这场雨根本没什么害处！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎，感觉根本没必要害怕嘛……这场雨根本没什么害处！

Entries.DialogueText: 动物好像还挺喜欢这场雨的……可能是因为它让草料的营养增加了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 动物好像还挺喜欢这场雨的……可能是因为它让草料的营养增加了。

Entries.DialogueText: 你可以使用镰刀割草来当饲料。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你可以使用镰刀割草来当饲料。

Entries.DialogueText: 当然，你也可以从我这里买！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 当然，你也可以从我这里买！

Entries.DialogueText: 我正需要点钱…… {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我正需要点钱……

Entries.DialogueText: 再见。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 再见。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨。需要什么吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨。需要什么吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 我以后可能会养些其他种类的动物。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我以后可能会养些其他种类的动物。

Entries.DialogueText: 但是呢，我得确保他们能卖个好价钱，所以你要先加强自己的畜牧技术。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 但是呢，我得确保他们能卖个好价钱，所以你要先加强自己的畜牧技术。

Entries.DialogueText: 只要尊重对待你的动物们，总会有好事发生。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 只要尊重对待你的动物们，总会有好事发生。

Entries.DialogueText: 大多数晚上，你可以在酒吧找到我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 大多数晚上，你可以在酒吧找到我。

Entries.DialogueText: 动物们是很好的同伴，但我也需要花时间和人们相处。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 动物们是很好的同伴，但我也需要花时间和人们相处。

Entries.DialogueText: 不知道刘易斯先生一个人住在那么大的房子里会不会孤单呢…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 不知道刘易斯先生一个人住在那么大的房子里会不会孤单呢……

Entries.DialogueText: 难道你不觉得那里空荡荡的吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 难道你不觉得那里空荡荡的吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 你去过我家西边那个奇怪的高塔吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你去过我家西边那个奇怪的高塔吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 有一次，我听到那里传来可怕、怪异的声响。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 有一次，我听到那里传来可怕、怪异的声响。

Entries.DialogueText: 我要是你的话就远远避开那个地方……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我要是你的话就远远避开那个地方……

Entries.DialogueText: 嘿，很高兴见到你！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嘿，很高兴见到你！

Entries.DialogueText: 想什么时候来看我们都可以哦。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 想什么时候来看我们都可以哦。

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，{Farmer_Name}！ {Portrait:Happy}
真高兴我们能成为朋友。我就知道可以把我可爱的动物们托付给你照顾。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真高兴我们能成为朋友。我就知道可以把我可爱的动物们托付给你照顾。

Entries.DialogueText: 那么，姑且一试吧……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 那么，姑且一试吧……

Entries.DialogueText: 嗯，虽然我没有赢……但能和大家一起分享我辛勤劳作的成果，这也不错！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗯，虽然我没有赢……但能和大家一起分享我辛勤劳作的成果，这也不错！

Entries.DialogueText: 你的农庄展览格子里放了些样子很奇怪紫色生菜啊！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你的农庄展览格子里放了些样子很奇怪紫色生菜啊！

Entries.DialogueText: 等等，这看起来像极了刘易斯镇长的内…… {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 等等，这看起来像极了刘易斯镇长的内……

Entries.DialogueText: 噢！……嘿嘿……没事！ {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢！……嘿嘿……没事！

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨，{Farmer_Name}。你都成落汤鸡了……可怜的孩子！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨，。你都成落汤鸡了……可怜的孩子！

Entries.DialogueText: Hello {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello !

Entries.DialogueText: You see this cat here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see this cat here?

Entries.DialogueText: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor little thing. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor little thing.

Entries.DialogueText: I think it likes this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good cat? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think it likes this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good cat?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, little %pet... You be a good kitty now... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, little ... You be a good kitty now... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Hello {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hello !

Entries.DialogueText: You see this dog here?
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see this dog here?

Entries.DialogueText: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor thing. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I found it sitting outside the entrance to your farm! I think it's a stray... poor thing.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, it seems to like this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good dog? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, it seems to like this place! Hey, um.... Don't you think this farm could use a good dog?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, %pet... You be a good pooch now... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, ... You be a good pooch now... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, Mr. {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, Mr. !

Entries.DialogueText: Good morning, Ms. {Farmer_Name}! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Good morning, Ms. !

Entries.DialogueText: I came by to ask you a favor, since you're such a kind neighbor.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I came by to ask you a favor, since you're such a kind neighbor.

Entries.DialogueText: You see, I'm trying to train my goats to say 'hello'... but they simply won't pay attention to me unless I have their favorite treat, cave carrots! {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You see, I'm trying to train my goats to say 'hello'... but they simply won't pay attention to me unless I have their favorite treat, cave carrots!

Entries.DialogueText: So... since I'm scared of the mines... I thought, well, maybe you would bring me a cave carrot when you have the chance?
Entries.DisplayPattern: So... since I'm scared of the mines... I thought, well, maybe you would bring me a cave carrot when you have the chance?

Entries.DialogueText: There's no pressure... but if you want to, just swing by my house between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM with a cave carrot. You'll make an old girl very happy. Bye.
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's no pressure... but if you want to, just swing by my house between 9:00 AM and 5:00 PM with a cave carrot. You'll make an old girl very happy. Bye.

Entries.DialogueText: My goats go wild over cave carrot... I can't imagine why.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My goats go wild over cave carrot... I can't imagine why.

Entries.DialogueText: You care too much about your job, Lewis. There are other things to life, you know. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You care too much about your job, Lewis. There are other things to life, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: ...but yes, I understand. I guess we'll have to keep...us...a secret. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...but yes, I understand. I guess we'll have to keep...us...a secret.

Entries.DialogueText: Gahh! {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gahh!

Entries.DialogueText: Why were you hiding there, anyway? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why were you hiding there, anyway?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh no... this doesn't look good. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh no... this doesn't look good.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? You'd better keep your eye on him... next time you catch him coming out of the Saloon, you should say something... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? You'd better keep your eye on him... next time you catch him coming out of the Saloon, you should say something...

Entries.DialogueText: Is everything alright, {Farmer_Name}? You seem worried...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Is everything alright, ? You seem worried...

Entries.DialogueText: Alright... we've caught him in the act. Now let's confront him. Take a deep breath... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Alright... we've caught him in the act. Now let's confront him. Take a deep breath...

Entries.DialogueText: Shane... this is what you've been doing in here? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane... this is what you've been doing in here?

Entries.DialogueText: But... these cans... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... these cans...

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Haley? When do we stop? M... My legs... *pant* *pant* {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Haley? When do we stop? M... My legs... *pant* *pant*

Entries.DialogueText: Yep
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yep

Entries.DialogueText: I do!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I do!

Entries.DialogueText: Mmmm... %farm eggs.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmmm... eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Leah? How much longer will this be? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Leah? How much longer will this be?

Entries.DialogueText: ...My knees are quivering, my thighs are whimpering, and I've lost all sensation in my foot. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...My knees are quivering, my thighs are whimpering, and I've lost all sensation in my foot.

Entries.DialogueText: Make me look good!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Make me look good!

Entries.DialogueText: Oooh!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oooh!

Entries.DialogueText: I love it! That's going up in my room... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love it! That's going up in my room...

Entries.DialogueText: Let me see
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me see

Entries.DialogueText: Em... {Farmer_Name}, why don't you go ahead and keep yours? It might be nice to, uh... own your first-ever painting... ya know? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Em... , why don't you go ahead and keep yours? It might be nice to, uh... own your first-ever painting... ya know?

Entries.DialogueText: Um... Honey? Where were you planning to hang that painting you did? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Honey? Where were you planning to hang that painting you did?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Mr. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Mr. .

Entries.DialogueText: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Ms. {Farmer_Name}. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh! You brought the cave carrot! Thank you so much, Ms. .

Entries.DialogueText: This looks great... I almost want to eat it myself! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This looks great... I almost want to eat it myself!

Entries.DialogueText: ...almost.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...almost.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope it wasn't too much trouble... I really do appreciate it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope it wasn't too much trouble... I really do appreciate it.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks again for helping me out. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks again for helping me out.

Entries.DialogueText: ...and my goats say 'thanks' too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and my goats say 'thanks' too.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh dear...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh dear...

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... Can you do something? He's out cold. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... Can you do something? He's out cold.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer! {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane! What's the matter with you? All you do anymore is mope around your room and drink beer!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm worried...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm worried...

Entries.DialogueText: What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's your plan? Don't you ever think about the future?

Entries.DialogueText: Hi Shane... you look unusually happy today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi Shane... you look unusually happy today.

Entries.DialogueText: Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Let me guess... Gus had a clearance sale on canned beer?

Entries.DialogueText: He looks sharp!
Entries.DisplayPattern: He looks sharp!

Entries.DialogueText: 我已经尽我所能，但相比皮埃尔，我的展览差远了。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我已经尽我所能，但相比皮埃尔，我的展览差远了。

Entries.DialogueText: 好吧，也许评委们会因为这一大个奶酪圈给我加分。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 好吧，也许评委们会因为这一大个奶酪圈给我加分。

Entries.DialogueText: 我的动物们今年状态很不错！希望高品质的产品能打动评委。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我的动物们今年状态很不错！希望高品质的产品能打动评委。

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}，你的农庄展览怎么样了？现在正是展示劳动成果的时候。 {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ，你的农庄展览怎么样了？现在正是展示劳动成果的时候。

Entries.DialogueText: 您好，{Farmer_Name}。这个秋天收成如何？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 您好，。这个秋天收成如何？

Entries.DialogueText: 天气越来越冷了……农作物都快要枯萎了。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 天气越来越冷了……农作物都快要枯萎了。

Entries.DialogueText: 希望贾斯在那里面没事。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 希望贾斯在那里面没事。

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}，你今年的收成怎么样？
Entries.DisplayPattern: ，你今年的收成怎么样？

Entries.DialogueText: 欢迎来到复活节……这个节日全靠我家母鸡下的蛋维持着。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 欢迎来到复活节……这个节日全靠我家母鸡下的蛋维持着。

Entries.DialogueText: 母鸡下蛋，但公鸡也扮演着重要的角色……它们保护母鸡，防止母鸡互相打架！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 母鸡下蛋，但公鸡也扮演着重要的角色……它们保护母鸡，防止母鸡互相打架！

Entries.DialogueText: 这样就有更快乐的母鸡和质量更好的蛋…… {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这样就有更快乐的母鸡和质量更好的蛋……

Entries.DialogueText: *唉*……大家都成双成对……凄凄惨惨戚戚。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *唉*……大家都成双成对……凄凄惨惨戚戚。

Entries.DialogueText: 这个地方很开阔，非常适合放牧，你说是不是？ {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这个地方很开阔，非常适合放牧，你说是不是？

Entries.DialogueText: 悄悄跟你说……我感觉刘易斯会邀请我跳舞！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 悄悄跟你说……我感觉刘易斯会邀请我跳舞！

Entries.DialogueText: 你要是带来了煮汤的材料，那就爬上那边的梯子把汤料丢进锅里。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你要是带来了煮汤的材料，那就爬上那边的梯子把汤料丢进锅里。

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}，你好！你带了食材吗？爬上梯子丢进百乐汤里就行了！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ，你好！你带了食材吗？爬上梯子丢进百乐汤里就行了！

Entries.DialogueText: 这么陈旧的木制码头却挤满了人！我还是待在沙滩上吧。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这么陈旧的木制码头却挤满了人！我还是待在沙滩上吧。

Entries.DialogueText: 我没法走到码头前面了，听到木头嘎吱的声音我就发抖。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我没法走到码头前面了，听到木头嘎吱的声音我就发抖。

Entries.DialogueText: 我小时候有一次在码头踩到腐烂的木头落水了，然后就有了心理阴影…… {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我小时候有一次在码头踩到腐烂的木头落水了，然后就有了心理阴影……

Entries.DialogueText: 欢迎来到冬日星盛宴！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 欢迎来到冬日星盛宴！

Entries.DialogueText: 祝你宴会快乐，{Farmer_Name}！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 祝你宴会快乐，！

Entries.DialogueText: 我替外面那些又冷又饿的动物默哀。 {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我替外面那些又冷又饿的动物默哀。

Entries.DialogueText: 哇……那只小猪裹得严严实实，好可爱！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哇……那只小猪裹得严严实实，好可爱！

Entries.DialogueText: 真是一份好到令人难以置信的礼物！谢谢。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 真是一份好到令人难以置信的礼物！谢谢。

Entries.DialogueText: 非常感谢！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 非常感谢！

Entries.DialogueText: 噢。我想我会收下它的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 噢。我想我会收下它的。

Entries.DialogueText: 这东西一文不值。我搞不懂你怎么想的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这东西一文不值。我搞不懂你怎么想的。

Entries.DialogueText: 非常感谢！这看起来不错。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 非常感谢！这看起来不错。

Entries.DialogueText: 我知道我会喜欢这部电影的！你能邀请我真是太好了，{Farmer_Name}。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我知道我会喜欢这部电影的！你能邀请我真是太好了，。

Entries.DialogueText: 哦，我很高兴全家人最后都没事了。还有奶牛也是！ {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哦，我很高兴全家人最后都没事了。还有奶牛也是！

Entries.DialogueText: 在电影这方面我很随意的……我什么都喜欢！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 在电影这方面我很随意的……我什么都喜欢！

Entries.DialogueText: 我看得很开心，{Farmer_Name}！谢谢你能想起我。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我看得很开心，！谢谢你能想起我。

Entries.DialogueText: 哎，{Farmer_Name}，我在想动物奶的事情。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 哎，，我在想动物奶的事情。

Entries.DialogueText: 你喝过骆驼奶吗？据说味道是咸的。
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你喝过骆驼奶吗？据说味道是咸的。

Entries.DialogueText: 我家里多了一卷墙纸，20 个三花蛋卖给你！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 我家里多了一卷墙纸，20 个三花蛋卖给你！

Entries.DialogueText: “我现在不在，你可以用动物目录来买东西！”——玛妮
Entries.DisplayPattern: “我现在不在，你可以用动物目录来买东西！”——玛妮

Entries.DialogueText: 这些小可爱需要温暖的家……
Entries.DisplayPattern: 这些小可爱需要温暖的家……

Entries.DialogueText: 太好了！我现在就把{0}送到你家。 {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: 太好了！我现在就把{0}送到你家。

Entries.DialogueText: 你好！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好！

Entries.DialogueText: 你好！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 你好！

Entries.DialogueText: 你好，{Farmer_Name}
是想来购置补给品吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 是想来购置补给品吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 把你的脚擦干！
Entries.DisplayPattern: 把你的脚擦干！

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨！最近天气还好吗？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨！最近天气还好吗？

Entries.DialogueText: 嗨！{Farm_Name}农场最近如何了？
Entries.DisplayPattern: 嗨！{1}农场最近如何了？
